The scholarship supports students studying an undergraduate degree within the University of Sydney Susan Wakil School of Nursing and Midwifery. $32,500 per annum for up to 3 years
A scholarship valued at $9,000 to support a student completing an internship in digital health.
Valued at $5,000 scholarship, a scholarship for international students transferring from an articulation partner institution to an undergraduate Science degree

course: Judge Ralph J Perdriau Practical Legal Training Scholarship for Marrickville Legal Centre
scholarshipDetail: A $20,000 scholarship to support students currently enrolled in final semester in a LLB or JD and willing to undertake a 75-day PLT program at the Marrickville Legal Centre.

program: Undergraduate, Honours, Graduate Coursework, Graduate Research
scholarshipDetail: Newman College offers accommodation fee scholarships up to $10,000 per annum for international students residing at the college. Awards are automatically considered for eligible applicants enrolled at the University of Melbourne, requiring no separate application. Recipients must maintain academic performance (minimum WAM 65-75% depending on award type) and contribute to college community life. Excludes study abroad/exchange students.

Awarded annually since 1967 to the top-performing final-year DVM student with the highest aggregate marks in clinical subjects. Open to domestic and international students. Value: Up to $500 one-off payment. No application required - automatic consideration based on academic performance15.

Awarded to students with the highest mark in 'Health Care in Context' (or successor subject) enrolled in the Doctor of Physiotherapy. Automatic consideration for eligible candidates. Value: $200 one-off payment12

Established by James Monaham Lewis to recognize academic excellence in Periodontics and General Practice within the Doctor of Dental Surgery program. Awarded automatically to the top student based on marks in DENT90120 Dental Practice. Value: $150 (one-off). Open to domestic and international students.

Awarded to top-performing students in first-year Chemistry under the Bachelor of Science program. Provides a one-off payment of up to AUD 1,600 for academic excellence. Open to domestic and international students with automatic consideration upon enrollment.

Awarded to high-achieving students in the Bachelor of Agriculture (Honours). One-off payment up to $500. Open to domestic & international students. No application required - automatic consideration based on academic performance.

Awarded annually to the Dux (top student) of the Bachelor of Agriculture program. Open to domestic/international students. Value: Up to AUD 200 one-off payment. No application required - automatic consideration based on academic performance.

Scholarships for domestic and international students based on financial need, academic merit, and community service. Offers up to $25,000 annually to support residential fees at Janet Clarke Hall. Applicants must apply through the Intercollegiate Portal first, then complete scholarship forms with financial documentation.

program: Undergraduate, Honours, Graduate Coursework, Graduate Research
scholarshipDetail: Accommodation fee scholarships ranging from 5,000 to 5,000to36,000 per annum for domestic/international students facing financial barriers. Supports residency at Ormond College with 50+ awards annually. Eligibility includes demonstrated financial need, full-time study at University of Melbourne, and applications assessed case-by-case. Funds cover tuition fees and are renewable for multiple years.

course: Bachelor of Agriculture or Bachelor of Science (Agriculture Subjects)
scholarshipDetail: Established in 1920 by Sir John and Lady Higgins, this prize is awarded to the student with the highest aggregate marks in the third year of the Bachelor of Agriculture or agriculture subjects within the Bachelor of Science. Open to domestic and international students. Value: Up to $500 (one-off payment). No application required; automatic consideration based on academic performance.

A merit-based scholarship offering AUD 6,000 for one year to support high-achieving students pursuing a Bachelor of Commerce (Honours) majoring in accounting or finance. Open to international students, Australian/NZ citizens, permanent residents, and humanitarian visa holders. Selection based on academic performance in accounting/finance units during the final two years of undergraduate studies and panel interview. No application required – automatic assessment for eligible candidates. Requires full-time enrollment and maintenance of 70 WAM.

The Alfred Research Alliance Honours Scholarship (formerly the AMREP Honours Scholarship) is a scholarship for students studying an honours program at the Alfred precinct in Melbourne. You could receive a payment of $6000. Value: $6,000 per annum for a maximum of one year. Eligibility: Open to international students completing the Bachelor of Science or Bachelor of Biomedical Science, commencing or continuing in a full-time Alfred Research Alliance (ARA) honours program at the Alfred campus, with a Weighted Average Mark (WAM) of 80 or above across undergraduate study. Selection is based on academic achievement; shortlisted students may be interviewed. To retain this scholarship, students must maintain full-time enrolment and demonstrate satisfactory progress as determined by a brief report from their honours supervisor.

Beasiswa ini diberikan kepada mahasiswa internasional yang menunjukkan prestasi akademik luar biasa dan memiliki potensi kepemimpinan. Penerima beasiswa akan mendapatkan pembebasan 100% biaya kuliah untuk durasi program studi mereka. Beasiswa ini tidak mencakup biaya hidup, akomodasi, atau OSHC. Penerima juga diharapkan berpartisipasi dalam program Monash Global Ambassadors mulai semester kedua studi mereka.

Beasiswa ini diberikan kepada mahasiswa internasional yang menunjukkan prestasi akademik luar biasa dan memiliki potensi kepemimpinan. Penerima beasiswa akan mendapatkan pembebasan 100% biaya kuliah untuk durasi program studi mereka. Beasiswa ini tidak mencakup biaya hidup, akomodasi, atau OSHC. Penerima juga diharapkan berpartisipasi dalam program Monash Global Ambassadors mulai semester kedua studi mereka.

Beasiswa ini ditujukan untuk mahasiswa internasional yang mendaftar pada program Bachelor of Biomedical Science (Scholar Program) di kampus Monash Australia. Diberikan kepada pelamar dengan nilai ATAR 98+ atau setara. Nilai beasiswa sebesar AUD 3.000 per 48 poin kredit studi, hingga maksimum AUD 9.000 selama 3 tahun. Tidak memerlukan aplikasi terpisah; semua pelamar yang mencantumkan Monash University sebagai preferensi VTAC akan otomatis dipertimbangkan. Penerima beasiswa harus mempertahankan status pendaftaran penuh waktu dan Weighted Average Mark (WAM) minimal 70 setiap semester.

Beasiswa CF-MGS ditujukan untuk mahasiswa internasional yang menempuh program PhD atau Master by Research di Monash University. Beasiswa ini memberikan tunjangan hidup sebesar AUD $36,063 per tahun (tarif 2025), tunjangan relokasi hingga AUD $2,000 untuk mahasiswa internasional, serta beasiswa biaya kuliah yang ditanggung oleh fakultas. Seleksi didasarkan pada prestasi akademik, pengalaman riset sebelumnya, dan kemampuan bahasa Inggris. Pendaftaran dilakukan bersamaan dengan aplikasi program studi melalui Applicant Portal Monash. Batas waktu pendaftaran untuk mahasiswa internasional adalah 31 Agustus 2025.

Cochrane Scholarship adalah beasiswa penuh yang menanggung biaya kuliah hingga empat tahun untuk program sarjana di Monash Business School. Penerima juga mendapatkan tunjangan tahunan sebesar AUD 6.000. Beasiswa ini ditujukan bagi mahasiswa internasional yang berada di Australia dengan visa Bridging E, Bridging A (dengan permohonan visa perlindungan permanen), Temporary Protection Visa, atau Safe Haven Enterprise Visa. Penerima harus mempertahankan nilai rata-rata tertimbang (WAM) minimal 50 setiap semester. Beasiswa ini tidak tersedia untuk tahun 2024.

Scholarship to honour David Shugg's contribution to paramedic professionalism, supporting students pursuing Honours in Paramedicine at Monash University. Covers tuition fees for 48 credit points (1-year full-time equivalent). Eligibility: Completion of Bachelor of Paramedicine (or equivalent) with at least 70% average in 24 credit points at third-year level. Selection based on application, academic achievement, CV, and interview. Project should focus on improving paramedic professionalism, including areas like communication, non-technical skills, clinical reasoning, emotions, values, and reflective practice. Open to international students.

course: Department of Economics Honours Merit Scholarship
scholarshipDetail: Beasiswa ini diberikan kepada mahasiswa berprestasi yang memulai studi penuh waktu di program Bachelor of Commerce (Honours) atau Bachelor of Economics (Honours) di kampus Clayton, Monash University. Terbuka untuk mahasiswa internasional. Nilai beasiswa sebesar AUD $10.000 untuk satu tahun. Penerima beasiswa harus mempertahankan nilai rata-rata Honours Level 2A (distinction) pada Semester Pertama untuk menerima pembayaran pada Semester Kedua. Tidak diperlukan aplikasi terpisah; penilaian dilakukan secara otomatis berdasarkan aplikasi program Honours dan hasil studi sebelumnya.

Beasiswa ini ditujukan untuk mahasiswa internasional yang memulai atau melanjutkan program Honours penuh waktu di School of Public Health and Preventive Medicine, Monash Alfred campus. Program yang memenuhi syarat meliputi Bachelor of Medical Sciences (Honours), Bachelor of Biomedical Sciences (Honours), dan Bachelor of Health Sciences (Honours). Pelamar harus memiliki Weighted Average Mark (WAM) minimal 70% pada studi sarjana terkait. Beasiswa bernilai AUD $3.000 untuk satu tahun dan diberikan secara otomatis tanpa perlu aplikasi terpisah. Penerima beasiswa harus mempertahankan status pendaftaran penuh waktu dan menunjukkan kemajuan akademik yang memuaskan.

These prestigious scholarships are awarded in memory of the tragic events that took place during October 2002 in the Department of Econometrics and Business Statistics, and its honours students. A major fundraising campaign was launched by the Department and its alumni, enabling the faculty to offer these scholarships. The scholarship is valued at AUD $15,000 for one year (48 credit points of study). Five scholarships are available per year. Eligibility: Open to international students commencing or continuing full-time in the Bachelor of Commerce honours program with a specialisation in econometrics, business analytics, or actuarial studies. Selection is based on academic achievement. No application is required; all eligible students will be automatically assessed. To retain this scholarship, recipients must maintain full-time enrolment and a minimum of an honours level 2A (distinction) grade average for the duration of the degree.

Monash University offers the Engineering Accommodation Scholarship to support international students commencing an undergraduate or postgraduate degree in the Faculty of Engineering at a Monash campus in Australia. The scholarship provides up to AUD 14,000 towards accommodation at Monash Residential Services (MRS) for one year. Eligibility criteria include being an international student (excluding Australian and New Zealand citizens) and enrolling in a full-time engineering program. Selection is based on academic achievement, and no separate application is required as all eligible students are automatically considered.

The Engineering International High Achievers Scholarship recognizes high-achieving international students enrolling in engineering programs at Monash University. Benefits include AUD $15,000 per 48 credit points towards tuition fees, up to four years for undergraduates. Eligibility: International students commencing a single undergraduate degree in the Faculty of Engineering with an ATAR or international equivalent of 95+, or postgraduate students commencing a degree in the Faculty of Engineering with a minimum WAM of 75. No application required; students are automatically assessed. Recipients must maintain a minimum WAM of 70 to retain the scholarship.

program: Bachelor of Engineering (Honours) / Master of Engineering
scholarshipDetail: Beasiswa ini ditujukan untuk mahasiswa internasional berprestasi yang mengikuti program jalur percepatan Bachelor of Engineering (Honours) / Master of Engineering di Monash University. Total nilai beasiswa hingga AUD 30.000, terdiri dari AUD 6.000 per 48 kredit poin selama program sarjana dan tambahan AUD 6.000 untuk komponen Master. Persyaratan meliputi pencapaian Weighted Average Mark (WAM) minimal 65% pada akhir tahun ketiga studi sarjana. Beasiswa ini membantu mengurangi beban biaya studi dan mendorong mahasiswa untuk melanjutkan ke jenjang Master.

course: 2025 Melbourne & Brisbane Campus Scholarship Course Fees
scholarshipDetail: Up to $2,000 discount for Melbourne campus packaged courses and $4,000 discount for Brisbane campus packaged courses
Full-term scholarship covering final-term tuition fees
Partial Tuition Waiver
Research Funding
Fee Discount
AU$5,000 one-off payment towards tuition for high-achieving international Foundation Studies students commencing in July 2025, requiring a valid student visa and offer letter.

AU$2,000 one-off payment (plus a Medibank industry experience opportunity) for international students commencing eligible vocational education, associate degree, bachelor or master (coursework) programs in Semester 2, 2025, requiring a valid visa and offer letter.

20% tuition fee reduction scholarship for outstanding students from Cambodia, Indonesia, Malaysia, Philippines, Thailand and Vietnam in eligible RMIT Melbourne programs, requiring citizenship of those countries, offshore application and a valid student visa.

course: English to Foundation Studies Pathway Bursary
scholarshipDetail: 20% tuition fee bursary for offshore international students (from specified Asian countries) on eligible English for Academic Purposes (EAP) pathway courses to RMIT Foundation Studies.

course: RMIT English Language Bursary for Asia
scholarshipDetail: 10–20% tuition fee discount on RMIT English (ELICOS/EAP) programs for eligible citizens of Cambodia, Japan, South Korea, Taiwan, Thailand or Vietnam commencing in 2025.
20% tuition fee reduction for international students from India, Sri Lanka, Bangladesh, Bhutan, Nepal, or Pakistan commencing Bachelor or Master by Coursework programs.

course: RMIT Research International Tuition Fee Scholarship (RRITFS)
scholarshipDetail: Covers full tuition fees for international students undertaking a PhD program at RMIT University.
Provides tuition fee offset for international students enrolled in a PhD program, funded by the Australian Government.

20% potongan biaya kuliah untuk Trisemester 1 dan 3 bagi mahasiswa internasional dengan IPK ≥70% atau portofolio luar biasa. Dukungan finansial lanjutan tersedia bagi yang mempertahankan prestasi tinggi.
Hingga AUD 3.000 potongan per trisemester bagi mahasiswa dengan kemampuan komunikasi dan media sosial yang kuat, serta berkontribusi dalam kegiatan kampus sebagai duta internasional.
Hingga 10% potongan biaya kuliah per trisemester bagi mahasiswa yang mempertahankan rata-rata nilai Distinction atau High Distinction.
Beasiswa khusus untuk program seperti Musik, Audio Engineering, Film & TV, Bisnis Hiburan, Desain, Animasi, Game Design, dan Akting. Detail dan syarat disesuaikan dengan program studi.

$1,000 per session to assist UTS students with costs associated with participation in the Global Exchange program; awarded on merit to students selected for full‑time exchange who are accepted by their host institution and not already in receipt of another UTS International scholarship

Awarded to top ATAR school‑leaver or gap‑year students commencing a UTS Business School undergraduate degree; valued at $30,000 over three years ($10,000 per year); selection based on Year 12 academic excellence and UAC preference to UTS Business School (domestic applicants only)

course: Faculty of Arts and Social Sciences Undergraduate Student Merit Scholarship
scholarshipDetail: $5,000 to support continuing full‑time undergraduates in the Faculty of Arts and Social Sciences demonstrating financial hardship and academic merit (minimum 48 credit points completed and WAM 75+ preferred); open to Australian/New Zealand citizens and permanent residents with a successful UAC Equity Scholarship application

$5,000 awarded to high‑achieving undergraduates in Civil and Environmental Engineering or Project Management based on academic merit and potential for leadership; open to domestic and international students
$10,000 awarded to female undergraduates in Civil, Construction and Environmental Engineering demonstrating high academic achievement and leadership potential

$10,000 for students in the Faculty of Design, Architecture and Building (including Architecture, Design and Construction disciplines); awarded on the basis of creative portfolio, academic merit and interview
$20,000 awarded to outstanding undergraduates in the Bachelor of Design in Architecture; selection based on academic excellence and design portfolio review

course: WEM Civil Scholarship for Construction and Engineering
scholarshipDetail: $15,000 plus a paid work placement awarded to first‑year undergraduates in Civil and Environmental Engineering demonstrating high academic potential

course: WJ & LM Sinclair Scholarship in Engineering
scholarshipDetail: $10,000–$20,000 per year (depending on number of recipients) for undergraduates in Engineering based on academic merit, leadership and community engagement

course: Engineering and Information Technology Dean’s Scholarship
scholarshipDetail: $30,000 awarded to high‑achieving domestic and international students commencing undergraduate programs in Engineering or Information Technology; selection based on ATAR and academic merit
$10,000 awarded to high‑performing students commencing undergraduate degrees in the Faculty of Health; selection based on ATAR and demonstrated commitment to health disciplines
$10,000 scholarship awarded to eligible international students from ASEAN countries for the duration of their full-time undergraduate or postgraduate coursework degree
$10,000 scholarship awarded to recognise academic excellence of incoming international students (undergraduate or postgraduate)
$5,000 grant awarded to international students who have a fully-funded external scholarship from an Asian or Australian scholarship body
$15,000 per year scholarship for talented students from designated ASEAN partner institutions, recognizing Macquarie University’s strong collaboration with universities in the ASEAN region
Full tuition fee waiver for eligible students on asylum seeker visas, covering all tuition for undergraduate, foundation or diploma programs at Macquarie University

course: English Language Scholarship for Sponsored Students
scholarshipDetail: 100% scholarship covering tuition for up to 10 weeks of Academic English (MQ University College) for sponsored international students preparing for undergraduate or postgraduate degrees

course: Faculty of Science and Engineering Women in STEM Scholarship
scholarshipDetail: $5,000 per year scholarship (up to 4 years) for female-identifying students in Science, Engineering or IT, encouraging women in STEM fields

course: Faculty of Science and Engineering Sustainability Scholarship
scholarshipDetail: $5,000 per year scholarship (up to 4 years) for high-achieving Science, Engineering or IT students committed to making a positive impact on sustainability goals (UN SDGs)
$2,500 one-time scholarship for international undergraduate students (paid after census) with membership in the Medibank Scholars Network for special events and mentoring
$3,333 one-off scholarship supporting a six-week intensive summer research project in quantum technology for undergraduate students
$5,000 scholarship applied towards tuition for outstanding international students from ASEAN countries pursuing STEM studies

course: Faculty of Science and Engineering FIRST Australia Scholarship
scholarshipDetail: $5,000 per year scholarship for domestic or international students who have participated in FIRST Australia robotics programs and are commencing an undergraduate degree in Science or Engineering

course: The AFMA Women in Financial Markets Scholarship
scholarshipDetail: $10,000 scholarship for outstanding female-identifying students continuing in finance-related degrees (Applied Finance or Commerce)

Scholarship fund providing support for domestic or international Macquarie students to undertake study-abroad or short-term academic programs in Taiwan (as part of their degree), fostering deeper immersion in Taiwanese culture
Merit-based grant for high-achieving students commencing the Bachelor of Actuarial Studies degree at Macquarie University

Beasiswa bagi pelamar dari latar belakang pengungsi atau berstatus visa kemanusiaan yang mengalami kesulitan keuangan; mencakup seluruh biaya kuliah (tidak termasuk SSAF) untuk durasi program penuh dan tunjangan kas hingga AUD 5.000 per semester; penerima harus tinggal di Australia, memiliki offer non-conditional untuk mulai studi pada Semester 1 2026, dan memenuhi kriteria latar belakang pengungsi serta bukti kesulitan finansial.

program: Postgraduate coursework (Graduate Diploma in Legal Practice)
scholarshipDetail: Mendukung lulusan hukum untuk mengikuti Graduate Diploma in Legal Practice di Curtin; tersedia untuk pelamar internasional dan domestik yang diterima/enrol minimal 25 kredit untuk Study Block 1 (2026); nilai: pembayaran tunai satu kali AUD 4,000 untuk membantu biaya terkait pendidikan.

Beasiswa untuk mahasiswa internasional yang berprestasi sebagai dukungan biaya studi; memberikan kredit sekali bayar sebesar AUD 10,000 terhadap biaya tuition untuk program yang diambil; berbasis merit dan tersedia untuk berbagai fakultas.

Beasiswa berbasis prestasi akademik untuk mahasiswa masa depan (termasuk internasional) yang memberikan potongan 20% dari tuition fee selama durasi program; tersedia untuk berbagai fakultas dan program studi Curtin.

program: Undergraduate, Postgraduate coursework (transfer dari kampus global Curtin)
scholarshipDetail: Ditujukan untuk mahasiswa internasional yang telah memulai studi di salah satu kampus global Curtin dan ingin pindah ke kampus Perth; memberikan kredit sekali bayar AUD 10,000 terhadap tuition fee untuk membantu transisi ke kampus Perth.

course: Curtin University top up scholarship - Vietnam Government PhD Scholarship (Project 89)
scholarshipDetail: Skema kerjasama Project 89 antara Pemerintah Vietnam dan Curtin untuk mendukung kandidat Vietnam berprestasi mengikuti PhD di Curtin; Pemerintah Vietnam menyediakan hingga USD 25,000 per tahun (tuition) plus living stipend USD 1,120/bln, tiket pesawat pulang, dan OSHC; Curtin memberikan top-up living stipend (sampai tingkat stipend PhD Curtin) dan offset tuition jika ada kekurangan.

Untuk peserta program Global Scholars yang belajar di dua kampus global Curtin; pemberian kredit sekali bayar sebesar AUD 15,000 terhadap tuition fee Curtin Perth untuk mendukung pengalaman internasional dan koneksi industri; berlaku untuk mahasiswa masa depan internasional dan berbasis merit.

Bursary untuk membantu biaya masuk bagi mahasiswa internasional; memberikan satu kali remission/credit terhadap tuition fee sebesar AUD 1,000; tujuan untuk meringankan biaya awal studi di Curtin Perth.

Beasiswa bergengsi berbasis prestasi akademik untuk mahasiswa internasional; memberikan potongan tuition fee sebesar 40% untuk durasi program bagi kandidat yang memenuhi syarat dan menunjukkan prestasi luar biasa.

course: 2022 HDR Scholarship – PhD Scholarship on Concrete Research
scholarshipDetail: Beasiswa HDR untuk kandidat PhD yang bekerja pada riset beton daur ulang sebagai agregat pengganti; kandidat didorong mengikuti internship industri selama studi; berlaku untuk program PhD di Faculty of Science & Engineering (Engineering) dan memiliki persyaratan riset dan enrolment tertentu.

Beasiswa HDR untuk penelitian di Centre for Exploration Geophysics; status Open, aplikasi dibuka 19/09/2024 dan diterima sepanjang waktu; memberikan stipend AUD$35,000 p.a. (tax-free) pro rata untuk 3 tahun (dengan kemungkinan perpanjangan sampai 6 bulan) serta dukungan pengurangan biaya kuliah untuk kandidat internasional; syarat: memenuhi entry requirement PhD (termasuk persyaratan bahasa seperti IELTS/TOEFL), memiliki Master di geophysics atau bidang terkait, dan tidak menerima beasiswa lain; cara daftar: hubungi EOI form yang tercantum di halaman.

course: Graphitisation of renewable carbonaceous materials from biomass
scholarshipDetail: Beasiswa HDR (didanai HILT CRC) untuk riset graphitisation dari biomassa; status Open (Applications open 08/09/2025 — close 31/10/2025); nilai: stipend living AUD$37,500 p.a. (2025) pro rata indexed untuk sampai max 3.5 tahun plus Tuition Fees offset; eligibility: pendaftar harus full-time, memiliki kemampuan riset, gelar Master atau Bachelor (First Class Hons) atau setara; pendaftar internasional diperbolehkan; cara daftar: hubungi EOI form pada halaman.

Prestigious Forrest Research Foundation PhD Scholarship untuk kandidat dari seluruh dunia; status Open (Applications open 19/09/2025 — close 19/10/2025); paket untuk awardee internasional mencakup: RTP-equivalent stipend sekitar AUD$38,440 p.a. (2026), tunjangan akomodasi (contoh: AUD$25,740 di 2026 untuk Forrest Hall), one-off research & travel allowance hingga AUD$12,000, dan relocation allowance (economy airfare untuk penerima dan tanggungan jika eligible); syarat: First Class Honours atau setara, pendaftaran PhD internal di Curtin, persyaratan residency di Forrest Hall dan syarat pendaftaran full-time; cara daftar: lihat persyaratan dan EOI pada halaman.

course: HDR Scholarship support by Curtin - ARC project in fossils study
scholarshipDetail: Beasiswa HDR (ARC project) untuk studi fosil organik dan biomarker; status Open / applications accepted at any time (dibuka sejak 14/03/2022); nilai: living stipend AUD$28,854 p.a. (2022 RTP rates) pro rata indexed untuk sampai 3 tahun; mencakup field trips; eligibility: First Class Hons, Master atau setara di Chemistry, Geochemistry, Geology, Biology, Biochemistry, Environmental Science atau bidang terkait; pendaftar internasional diterima; cara daftar: kirim CV dan referees ke kontak tertera di halaman.

course: HDR Scholarship - The role of microbes in carbonate mineralization under different substrate conditions
scholarshipDetail: Beasiswa PhD (ARC project) tentang peran mikroba pada mineralisasi karbonat; status Open / applications accepted at any time (Applications open 15/05/2024); nilai: living stipend AUD$35,000 p.a. pro rata indexed untuk sampai max 3 tahun; eligibility: kandidat dengan first-class Hons, Master atau setara di Microbiology, Biotechnology, Geochemistry, Geology, Chemistry, Civil Engineering atau bidang terkait; pendaftar internasional diterima; cara daftar: EOI form dan kontak supervisor yang tercantum.

Dua beasiswa PhD yang dibiayai ARC untuk project 'Modelling, Design and Development of a Novel Wave-Energy Converter'; status Open (applications open 26/08/2023; diterima sepanjang waktu); nilai: living stipend AUD$35,000 p.a. (full-time) plus tuition fees cover hingga 4 tahun (jumlah paket tahunan ~ stipend + tuition coverage); eligibility: HDR students di bidang engineering/control systems/fluid-structure interaction; pendaftar internasional diperbolehkan; cara daftar: hubungi kontak/profesor tertera di halaman.

course: HDR Scholarship - Stipends for Higher Degree by Research
scholarshipDetail: Skema HDR stipend umum Curtin (base stipend) untuk HDR candidates; status Open (applications open 11/09/2025 / accepted at any time); nilai: 2026 base stipend kira-kira AUD$38,400 p.a. (tax-free) untuk hingga 3 tahun 6 bulan FTE; paket tahunan (stipend + tuition coverage untuk domestic) dapat bernilai ~AUD$70,000 per tahun; eligibility: semua tingkat fakultas untuk HDR campus-based, internasional diterima; cara daftar: review HDR Project Opportunities dan kirim EOI.

course: Western Australian Premier’s University Scholarship - Semester 1, 2026
scholarshipDetail: Scholarship pemerintah Western Australia untuk mahasiswa internasional berprestasi yang memilih Curtin; status Open (Applications open 01/08/2025 — close 14/11/2025); nilai: AUD$50,000 disalurkan sebagai fee discount terhadap tuition fees; eligibility: international students yang memenuhi kriteria prestasi akademik dan kelayakan program (lihat halaman untuk persyaratan lengkap); cara daftar: ikuti petunjuk di halaman beasiswa.

course: Civil and Structural Engineering PhD Scholarship
scholarshipDetail: PhD project pada structural health monitoring — status Closed (Applications open 24/01/2020, close 31/12/2024); deskripsi riset mencakup condition monitoring, vision-based vibration measurement, AI techniques, dan data analysis; nilai/ketentuan spesifik tidak aktif karena status closed; eligibility: kandidat PhD yang sesuai topik; untuk arsip dan kontak lihat halaman.
Partial Scholarship - awarding scholarships and discounts of between £2,000 and £7,000 to international students starting an undergraduate course at ARU.
Partial Scholarship - You could get up to £4,000 if you're studying for an MBA, pursuing a Masters at ARU Peterborough or ARU London, or are an ARU graduate and meet the eligibility criteria.
Partial Scholarship - In partnership with the British Council and the GREAT Britain Campaign, we're offering four £10,000 scholarships.
Partial Scholarship - In partnership with the British Council and the GREAT Britain Campaign, we're offering four £10,000 scholarships.
Partial Scholarship - £1,000 in your first year of study if you pay your tuition fees in full by the Friday before the start of teaching. This discount can be combined with other scholarships.
Partial Scholarship - There are two levels of scholarship, ranging from £1,400 up to £12,500 per year.
Partial Scholarship - £4,000 for a one-year course, or £2,000 for a two-year course with professional experience.

course: Ahuahu Fund for Conservation Biology Scholarship

course: AUT International scholarships for Southeast Asia

course: International scholarships by AUT Faculty of Business, Economics and Law

course: International scholarships by AUT Faculty of Culture and Society
scholarshipDetail: Contribution to tuition fees of $5,000 paid in the first year of study for undergraduate program and $7,000 for postgraduate program in the Faculty of Culture and Societypaid for the first year of study

course: International scholarships by AUT Faculty of Design and Creative Technologies

course: International scholarships by AUT Faculty of Health and Environmental Sciences

Each Vice-Chancellor’s Doctoral Scholarship consists of an annual stipend of $33,000, plus tuition fees and compulsory student services fee for up to three years.

university: Asia Pacific University of Technology & Innovation (APU)
scholarshipDetail: Successful applicants are entitled for discounts on tuition fees in addition to monthly stipends. The scheme is open to Masters and PhD (by research programmes only), subject to the terms and conditions as stipulated in our policy.

The Pro-Chancellor Scholarship is awarded to continuing students who have completed A-Level program in City University and are now pursuing a Degree program in City University. Up to 100% fee waiver for 1st year tuition fee Degree.

course: City U Scholarship for outstanding student
scholarshipDetail: Up to 80% tuition fee waiver for 1st year and for subsequent semesters in City University. This scholarship awarded to existing City University students who have consistently shown outstanding results in their degree and contribute toward the community and City University.

Up to 100% tuition fee waiver for subsequent semesters in City University. These programs have been developed in consultation with the industry to ensure that graduates are prepared and competent for work requirements.

Up to 100% tuition fee waiver for the minimum candidature period of the program. Other fees are payable in full. This Scholarship is offered to suitable applicants who are enrolling in postgraduate research program in City University.

Up to 100% tuition fee waiver for 1st year tuition fee Degree. This Scholarship is awarded to continuing students who have completed Foundation program in City University and are pursuing a Degree program in City University.

awarded to candidates who have outstanding sports achievement at the State and National levels or have demonstrated outstanding leadership quality through active participation in co-curricular activities, social services and volunteerism or have demonstrated strong entrepreneurial spirit in competition or start-ups.

course: NUS Business Dean’s & Mochtar Riady Scholarships
scholarshipDetail: Full Scholarship -  scholarships covering tuition fees and S$400 of monthly allowance (S$4800 yearly) for up to 5 years.
Full Scholarship - Covering tuition and other compulsory fees, Return economy air passage to and from home country, Annual Maintenance allowance.
Partial Scholarship - $10,000-$20,000 (depending on academic plan)
Partial Scholarship - $15,000 Awarded in the 2nd year, tenable for remaining duration of undergraduate study

Partial Scholarship - Scholarship recipients will receive a 10% reduction toward international tuition fees when commencing at the University of Adelaide.

Nico Burmeister has donated funds to the University of Western Australia (The University) to establish a scholarship to assist and encourage students to pursue a Juris Doctor at the University. Value : $15,000
BizCover seeks to support women in IT Field through the scholarship, which recognises the dedication of university students and encourages them to pursue a career in IT. Value : $10,000

Each year, the Centre for Social Impact UWA offers scholarships to students pursuing social impact studies. These scholarships empower successful recipients to pursue their passion for creating social impact by easing some of the financial barriers. Value : $10,000

The University of Western Australia with the funding grant from the Government of Western Australia is offering a high achieving international student a scholarship to commence and pursue a postgraduate qualification at the University. Value : $50,000

Dr Ted Maslen, BSc, DPhil, FAA and former Head of the Department of Physics at The University of Western Australia ('the University') donated funds to the University to provide a scholarship to encourage and assist a student from a regional and remote area of Western Australia to commence a Bachelor of Science at the University. Value : $2,500

The University of Western Australia ('the University') provides the UWA Humanitarian SWANS Scholarship to encourage and assist students from refugee and asylum seeker backgrounds to engage in tertiary education and undertake an undergraduate degree course at the University Value : $44,000

course: Dr And Mrs Boon Tock Lim Scholarship
scholarshipDetail: The family of the late Dr Boon Tock Lim have donated funds to The University of Western Australia ('the University') to establish a scholarship in honour of the late Dr Boon Tock Lim, to assist and encourage students who have graduated from the UWA Fairway Program to pursue a Cycle 1 undergraduate degree and subsequently a Cycle 2 postgraduate degree.Value : $80,000

course: Stephen Dornan Scholarship In Undergraduate French Studies
scholarshipDetail: The late Stephen Dornan OAM has bequeathed an amount to The University of Western Australia ('the University') to provide a scholarship to support and encourage a top Year 12 Western Australian Certificate of Education ('WACE') French student to pursue a major in French Studies. Value : $20,000
Kingster University offers a variety of scholar ships and fellowships designed to help you and your family pay for university. Scholarships and grants are types of gift

course: Aber Scholarships in Applied Science & Engineering
scholarshipDetail: Partial Scholarship - $10,000 awarded to a student entering First Year Mineral Engineering on the basis of academic standing. The award is renewable (valued at $5,000) for Second, Third and Fourth Year provided students continues in the program. Recipients must be from Nunavut, the North West Territories or the Yukon Territory.

course: Alice and Armen Matheson Entrance Scholarship in Piano Performance
scholarshipDetail: To be awarded as a full tuition entrance scholarship to a top undergraduate applicant in piano performance. The award is renewable for three additional years provided a standing of A- or higher is maintained in Piano Performance courses. If there is no such candidate, the award is then allotted to the top undergraduate applicant in violin performance under the same conditions.

course: Alice and Armen Matheson Scholarshipsin in Piano Performance
scholarshipDetail: To be awarded to outstanding undergraduate or graduate students in Piano Performance (including Collaborative Piano and Piano Pedagogy).

course: Allan Wai Chiu Mok and Isa Po Po Gok Admission Scholarship
scholarshipDetail: Awarded to a full-time student entering the First Year of any program in the Faculty on the basis of academic merit. Approximately between $7000 - $8000

The Estate of Arthur A. Shapiro, Class of 3T7, has provided this scholarship to be awarded to the student entering the Doctor of Pharmacy program who obtains the highest admission index score and has not received an award of greater value. Approximately $1,000

Awarded to a student or students entering first year, full-time, Civil Engineering, on the basis of outstanding academic merit. Preference given to students who have demonstrated leadership in the community and through extra-curricular activities. Approximately between $3200 - $3500
Awarded to a student (preferably female) entering first year of any undergraduate program in the Faculty on the basis of academic merit and demonstrated leadership. Approximately between $800-$1000

Awarded to a Victoria College student with demonstrated financial need who is from identified priority community such as an under-represented or at-risk group, with preference given to a first generation student. Renewable for the Second, Third, and Fourth year of study if an academic status of In Good Standing is maintained. $5,000 renewable

course: Betz Entrance Scholarship in Electrical and Computer Engineering
scholarshipDetail: Awarded to student(s) entering the Edward S. Rogers Sr. Department of Electrical and Computer Engineering on the basis of academic achievement. Extra-curricular activities, including a focus on design may also be considered. Approximately between $1000 - $2500

course: Braemar College - University of Toronto Award for Excellence
scholarshipDetail: To be awarded to a Braemar College student on admission to the University of Toronto on the basis of academic merit. $5000

program: Undergraduate / Master / PhD (jumlah dan kuota berbeda berdasarkan jenjang)
scholarshipDetail: Beasiswa Shenzhen Universiade (dikelola SUISF dan dilaksanakan di universitas-universitas Shenzhen) memberikan tunjangan tahunan untuk mahasiswa internasional yang belajar penuh waktu di China. Besaran umum (per tahun) berkisar sekitar: ±30,000 RMB untuk sarjana, ±35,000–45,000 RMB untuk master, dan ±40,000–45,000+ RMB untuk PhD (nilai bisa berubah tiap tahun dan antar-universitas). Syarat umum: bukan warga negara Tiongkok, sehat secara fisik & mental, terdaftar sebagai mahasiswa penuh waktu; seleksi biasanya melalui nominasi universitas dan pemilihan oleh SUISF. Periode pengumuman dan pendaftaran biasanya diumumkan tiap April–Mei.

Beasiswa yang diberikan oleh pemerintah kota Shenzhen (Shenzhen Universiade Scholarship). Nilai per tahun: sekitar 30 000 RMB untuk program Sarjana, sekitar 45 000 RMB untuk Master, dan sekitar 40 000 RMB untuk program Doktoral.

course: Guangdong Government Outstanding International Student Scholarship
scholarshipDetail: Beasiswa dari Pemerintah Provinsi Guangdong untuk mahasiswa internasional berprestasi. Nilai per tahun (returning students): 10 000 RMB untuk Sarjana, 20 000 RMB untuk Master, dan 30 000 RMB untuk Doktoral. Kuota (2025): Sarjana 30, Master 10, PhD 34. Pendaftaran: biasanya pada awal September; hasil diumumkan Oktober; dana dikirim sebelum akhir Desember.
